message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has the potential to be incredibly valuable.  I'm confident it's worth at least $1000000 to me, and I believe it could be even more valuable to the right person.  I'm willing to let you have it for $1500000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm sure you'll agree it's a great deal.  Let me know your thoughts.
